alert.note: Alert for Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Duval County through 615 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cecil Field, or 12 miles north of Middleburg. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cecil Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
